DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy gatifloxacin 0.3 % ophthalmic solution compare ciprofloxacin 0.3 % ophthalmic solution patient acute bacterial corneal ulcer
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Gatifloxacin Compared With Ciprofloxacin Patients With Acute Bacterial Corneal Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis one eye acute bacterial corneal ulcer ( > 1mm ) Corneal ulcer opinion investigator treat fortified antibiotic , multiple antibiotic , antiinfectives study medication
